careers.title: Data Scientist
careers.description: Extract insights from data, build predictive models, and deploy solutions to solve business problems.

careers.title: AI Engineer
careers.description: Design, build, and maintain AI models and systems. Focus on algorithms and computational efficiency.

careers.title: Full Stack Developer
careers.description: Develop and manage both frontend and backend of web applications. Expertise in the MERN stack is in high demand.

careers.title: DevOps Engineer
careers.description: Bridge the gap between development and operations. Focus on automating and optimizing the software delivery process.

careers.title: Cyber Security Analyst
careers.description: Protect an organization's computer systems and networks from threats. Monitor for security breaches and respond to attacks.

careers.title: Game Developer
careers.description: Design and code video games, from concept to final product. Work on graphics, gameplay, and user interface.

hidden_opportunities.title: Fintech Security Architect
hidden_opportunities.whyUnknown: High demand in Indiaâ€™s payments sector

hidden_opportunities.title: Urban Farming Specialist
hidden_opportunities.whyUnknown: Growing demand for sustainable food systems

mentors.name: Ravi Kumar
mentors.bio: Senior Engineer at a major tech company.

mentors.name: Priya Sharma
mentors.bio: Lead Security Analyst at a fintech firm.

mentors.name: Karthik Reddy
mentors.bio: Founder of a space tech startup.

mentors.name: Sneha Gupta
mentors.bio: Senior Data Scientist in the healthcare sector.

beginner.title: Personal Portfolio Website
beginner.description: A simple static site to showcase your projects and skills.

roadmap.frontend: Build UI with HTML/CSS. Use JavaScript for interactivity.
roadmap.backend: Not needed for a static site.
references: Video: 'Build a Personal Website from Scratch' on YouTube

beginner.title: To-Do List App
beginner.description: A basic web app that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks.

roadmap.frontend: Use React components for the list and input field.
roadmap.backend: Use local storage to save tasks in the browser.
references: Video: 'React To-Do App Tutorial' on YouTube

beginner.title: Weather App
beginner.description: Fetches weather data from a public API and displays it for a given city.

roadmap.backend: Use the OpenWeatherMap API to get data.

beginner.title: Data Cleaning Script
beginner.description: A Python script that takes a raw dataset and cleans it by handling missing values and duplicates.

roadmap.backend: Write a Python script to import, clean, and export the data.
references: Course: 'Python for Data Science' on Coursera

beginner.title: Quiz Application
beginner.description: An app that presents a series of multiple-choice questions and scores the user's performance.

roadmap.frontend: Build the quiz interface with dynamic HTML.
roadmap.backend: Use JavaScript to manage questions and calculate score.
references: Video: 'JavaScript Quiz App Tutorial' on YouTube

intermediate.title: E-commerce Recommender
intermediate.description: A full-stack application that suggests products to users based on their browsing history.

roadmap.frontend: Create React UI for browsing products.
roadmap.backend: Build a Flask API to serve product data and recommendations. Use MongoDB.
references: Course: 'Building a Recommender System' on Coursera

intermediate.title: Real-time Chat App
intermediate.description: A web application that allows multiple users to chat in real time.

roadmap.backend: Set up a Node.js server with WebSockets for real-time communication.
references: Video: 'Build a Real-time Chat App with MERN' on YouTube

intermediate.title: Movie Recommendation Engine
intermediate.description: A project that uses collaborative filtering to suggest movies to a user based on their ratings.

roadmap.backend: Write Python script to analyze movie data.
references: Article: 'Collaborative Filtering' on Towards Data Science

intermediate.title: Personal Finance Tracker
intermediate.description: A web app to track income and expenses and visualize spending habits.

roadmap.frontend: Design React UI with Chart.js for data visualization.
roadmap.backend: Build a REST API to manage transactions.

intermediate.title: Fintech Fraud Detection System
intermediate.description: Analyze transactional data to identify and flag fraudulent activity in a financial system.

roadmap.backend: Build a Python script using Scikit-learn for fraud detection.
references: Course: 'Fraud Detection in Finance' on Coursera

advanced.title: AI-Powered Code Reviewer
advanced.description: A tool that integrates with Git to analyze code, identify bugs, and suggest improvements.

roadmap.frontend: Build a simple UI to display code and suggestions.
roadmap.backend: Integrate with a Generative AI API to analyze code snippets.

advanced.title: Facial Recognition Security System
advanced.description: A system that uses computer vision to identify and authenticate users in real time.

roadmap.frontend: Build a UI to display the camera feed.
roadmap.backend: Use OpenCV and a trained model to process video streams.

advanced.title: Real-time Urban Air Quality Monitor
advanced.description: Collects air quality data from public APIs and provides real-time predictions for major Indian cities.

roadmap.frontend: Design a dashboard with real-time charts.
roadmap.backend: Set up a cloud pipeline to ingest and process data.

advanced.title: Automated Trading Bot
advanced.description: A program that connects to a trading API and automatically makes trades based on predefined strategies.

roadmap.backend: Build a Python script to connect to a trading API.

advanced.title: Medical Image Diagnosis Tool
advanced.description: A tool that uses a deep learning model to detect anomalies in medical images (e.g., X-rays).

roadmap.frontend: Build a UI for uploading images.
roadmap.backend: Train a model to classify medical images.
